game.title: The Castle Quest
game.objective: Travel to the castle in the mountains, obtain an ancient tome and return it to the quest giver.
game.description: You will need to be a high level to complete this quest. This quest can be finished at any time after you receive it. The quest giver will not wait forever.
game.quest-giver: The Old Sage Near the Village Gate

task.objective: Travel to the castle in the mountains.
task.description: You will need horses for this task.

task.objective: Obtain the ancient tome from within the castle.
Return the ancient tome to the quest giver.
